title.rendered: Rajhans Vidyalaya invites Smile kids to Annual Sports Day

content.rendered:
Rajhans Vidyalaya, Andheri, Mumbai, invited Smile Foundation children from the Mission Education centre SHED to their Annual Sports Day celebrations. A group of 89 children from the centre participated in the event along with students from the school, indulging in different games and activities, and taking part in competitions.

The camaraderie between the children from the SHED centre and Rajhans Vidyalaya was great and well evident to all present. Children were also treated to some great food and prizes after the competitions.

Such interactions between the privileged and underprivileged children are encouraged under Smile Foundation’s Child for Child (CFC) programme, which seeks to bridge the gap between children from the two worlds.
